string.text: Talk to Beard
Max come in and have some business.
Talk to the Pilot
The Beard said that the Pilot would take me to the Shorokhov Valley and give me further information.
Three comrades: tell Boroda about the fate of stalkers
We have learned all about the fate of Coward, Dunce and Experienced. Now it is necessary to tell Beard.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of the Coward, the Dunce and the Experienced
It is necessary to find out about the fate of the three stalkers who were sent to the Valley of Shorokhov: Coward, Dunce and Experienced.
Three comrades: find out about the fate of Coward and Dunce
We learned about the fate of Experienced. It remains to find out about the fate of Coward and Dunce.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of Coward and Experienced
We have learned of the fate of the Stooge. It remains to find out about the fate of Coward and Experienced.
Three comrades: find out about the fate of the Coward
It is necessary to learn about the fate of the Coward.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of the Dunce and Experienced
We have learned of the fate of the Coward. It remains to find out about the fate of the Dunce and Experienced.
Three comrades: find out about the fate of the Stooge
It is necessary to learn about the fate of the Stooge.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of Experienced
It is necessary to learn about the fate of Experienced.
Rare art: find the artifact "Heart of the Oasis"
It is necessary to find a very rare artifact "Heart of the Oasis".
Rare art: give the artifact "Heart of the Oasis" to Beard
The Heart of the Oasis artifact has been found. Now it must be given to Beard.
Former base: meet Mutny
Perhaps Mutny knows about the fate of the three missing stalkers.
Find an anomalous plant commissioned by scientists and hand it over to the intermediary.
Anomalous Plant: Explore the area
Anomalous plant: take the order to the intermediary
Unknown Creature: Go hunting with Ilya Barbos
Help the stalkers kill an unknown creature in an abandoned camp.
Take Fyodor's flash drive from the courier and take it to Mutny.
Muddy job: pick up the flash drive from the courier
Muddy work: take the flash drive to Mutny
Mutny: That's it, stalker - I don't need your help anymore.
Take Maximilian's package from the bandits.
Important package: give the package to Maximilian
Important package: pick up the package from Kostyan
Important package: take the package from the bandits
Important package: get to the bandit camp
Important premise: find the leader of the bandits
Important package: take the package
Let's follow the trail: meet Maximilian
Maximilian may have information about the missing stalkers.
Help Maximilian capture the mercenary camp.
Attack the mercenary camp: wait for the appointed time
Attack the Mercenary Camp: Destroy the Mercenaries
Attack the Mercenary Camp: Tell Maximilian Ready
Attack the Mercenary Camp: Follow Maximilian
Attack the Mercenary Camp: Talk to Maximilian
Maximilian: Come, let's talk.
Maximilian left without you.
Maximilian: Are you going for a walk? We start without you.
Talk to Maximilian.
Important Conversation: Talk to Radik
We need to find Radik and talk to him.
Hunger is not aunt: bring food
Bring food to Radik's party. Five rations are enough.
Masked: Retrieve Mercenary PDA
Maker: Talk to Radik
The Mercenary's PDA is needed to infiltrate their base.
Masked: Get the mercenary equipment from the merchant
Masked: Take the mercenary equipment from the messenger
Masked: Find Mercenary Equipment
Mercenary gear is needed to infiltrate their base.
Breakthrough: Escort Radik's squad
Breakthrough: plant explosives
Breakthrough: Talk to Radik
Take position near the mercenary base.
Radik: Hey, where did you run away to? Come back to the group!
Release stalkers who have been captured by mercenaries.
Release: sneaking into base under the guise of a mercenary
Release: Find the prisoners
Release: Destroy the mercenaries
Fedor has died.
Technical question: Talk to Mishka Tesla about the scanner
Mishka Tesla can help to get to the place where Trus is presumably located.
Get the missing parts for the scanner.
Missing parts: Bring the "Compass" and microchip to Mishka Tesla
Missing parts: Talk to Semyon
Missing parts: Find the "Compass" and microchip
Missing parts: Get the "Compass" artifact
Missing parts: Find Oleg Motalyga and retrieve the microchip for the scanner from him
Destroy mutants near the teleportation location.
Invisible death: clear the area of mutants.
Make your way to the plateau where Trus is believed to be located.
Path to the plateau: inform Mishka Tesla of your readiness.
Path to the plateau: install the scanner.
Path to the plateau: wait for Mishka Tesla to set up the scanner.
Path to the plateau: jump into the anomaly.
Return from the plateau: jump into the anomaly.
Search the area and wait for Mishka Tesla to set up the scanner for the return trip.
Path to the plateau: take the scanner.
Mishka Tesla: What a fool... How are you going to get back now?
Mishka Tesla: Where did you run off with my scanner?
Mishka Tesla: Hey, where are you going? I'm not going to wait for you here!
Mishka Tesla: Hey, my patience is wearing thin! Come back here now!
Mishka Tesla: That's it, I'm done with you. I'm going back to base.
Mishka Tesla: That's it, I've had enough of you!
Together with Volodya Bolshoi, capture Semyon Cowboy's base.
Ranch attack: talk to Volodya Bolshoi
Ranch attack: inform Volodya Bolshoi of readiness
Camp attack: meet with stalkers
It is necessary to meet with the stalkers to attack Mutny's base.
Camp attack: inform Grisha of readiness
Inform Grisha of readiness to attack Mutny's base.
Camp attack: destroy Mutny's squad
It is necessary to destroy Mutny's squad at the novice base.
Return the tools to the technician.
Tools: find Gena Nepomnyashchy
Tools: find a way to take the tools from Gena Nepomnyashchy
Tools: inform the technician that Gena Nepomnyashchy is dead
Tools: accompany Gena Nepomnyashchy to the burial place
Tools: bring the tools to the technician
Tools: take the tools
Tools: dig up the box
Tools: find a note from Gena Nepomnyashchy
Tools: inform the technician about what happened
Set the charge
Search the bush
Here you are, fool! You fell for such a trap. But thanks for the money, I can now leave the Zone peacefully. Goodbye. Always yours, Gena Nepomnyashchy.
Trader's laptop: find Rockefeller's laptop
Rockefeller asks to find his laptop, which he left in the military helicopter.
Trader's laptop: return Rockefeller's laptop
You need to bring Rockefeller's laptop to him.
Mysterious stranger: help destroy Snorks
Help destroy the Snorks that surround the unknown stalker.
Help destroy the mutants that surround the unknown stalker.
Mysterious stranger: help destroy mutants
Don't you dare sleep - enemies are everywhere!
Help Arthur retrieve his friends' flash drives from the anomaly.
Friendly debt: give the flash drives to Arthur
Friendly debt: find Vadik and Romka's flash drives
Friendly debt: find Vadik's flash drive
Friendly debt: find Romka's flash drive
Newbie base: We now have a new trader and technician.
Andrei Golova: Stalker, if you're interested in making good money, come to Ivan Kolbasa's basement - we'll talk.
Help stalkers take measurements in anomalies for scientists.
Anomaly research: report readiness
Anomaly research: accompany stalkers to measurement site
Anomaly research: talk to Andrei
Andrei Golova: Hey, where are you going? Come back to the group!
Andrei Golova: Are you going for a walk? Get back to the group!
Andrei Golova: That's it, you've pushed it. You can go about your business now. You're no longer part of the team.
Andrei Golova: Well done! Come get your reward.
Andrei Golova: Stalker, you didn't collect your payment. But I don't have time to wait for you. I'll leave the money with Ivan Kolbasa.
Damn! Andrei died. Let's return to the base.
Pick up artifact ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Trader's merchandise: reach the cave
You need to reach the cave where the trader's supplier disappeared.
Trader's merchandise: find the box with the goods
You need to find the box with the trader's goods.
Trader's merchandise: return the box with the goods
You need to return the trader's lost box with the goods.
Turn on the radio ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Turn off the radio ($$ACTION_USE$$)
After wandering through the Zone for a long time, the stalker Max decided to leave its perimeter. But before returning to the Big Land, he wanted to make a big score.
As luck would have it, Beard, a well-known artifact trader in Zaton, had a serious order for the extraction of a valuable anomalous formation that stalkers called the "Heart of Oasis."

When Beard gathered information about the possible location of the artifact, he sent three of his friends, whom he trusted with the most lucrative orders, to search for it. After some time, it became clear that the guys had disappeared.
Beard decided to organize a search and asked Max to find out about the fate of his comrades. Max set off with a guide to the Valley of Whispers...
Stalker Max left the Zone. How his life turned out on the Big Land is unknown.
Having learned about the fate of his comrades, Beard no longer made close friends among those who worked for him.
Beard never found out what happened to his comrades. But he no longer made close friends among those who worked for him.
Under the pressure of attacks by mercenaries, Maximilian retreated to his main base, blowing up the only bridge connecting the two parts of the valley. After that, the attacks by mercenaries stopped.
Having settled in a new place, Radik conducted "excursions" for newly arrived stalkers to local attractions.
Groups of scientists researching anomalous fields began to appear more and more frequently in the Valley of Whispers. They were particularly interested in local underground anomalies.
At the newcomers' base, everything is still calm. Among the newly arrived stalkers, the story about Mutny is passed from mouth to mouth and is embellished with legends.
Maximilian: Hey! We agreed to go together. Where did you run off to?
Maximilian: Where are you? Shit... Snorks!!! A-a-a-a!!!
Maximilian...
Rockefeller: Stalker, if you want to earn some money, come to me - I have a job for you.
Ivan Kolbasa: Help! We are under attack by mercenaries!
The Mysteries of the Underground: Talk to Rockefeller.
Talk to Rockefeller about explosives.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Retrieve explosives.
Retrieve explosives from Ivan Kolbasa.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Talk to Yasha.
Talk to Yasha.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Follow Yasha.
Follow Yasha to the cave.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Set the charge.
Set the charge to clear the passage in the underground.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Follow Yasha.
Follow Yasha in the underground.
The Mysteries of the Underground: Retrieve the reward from Rockefeller.
Retrieve the reward from Rockefeller for escorting the scientists.
Yasha: Hey, where are you running off to? Come back!
Yasha: Alright, we are heading to the base.
Yasha: Hey, going for a walk? Come back to the squad!
Yasha: That's it, you're out of the squad. We'll find someone else.
Valuable Weapon: Find Valery Palych's shotgun.
Valery Palych is asking to find his modified shotgun.
Valuable Weapon: Return the shotgun to Valery Palych.
Bring a shotgun to Valeri Palyich from the stalker base.
Valeri Palyich: The detector is ready, you can pick it up.
Professor Stakhovsky: The artifact is ready, you can pick it up.
Tourist
Give tourists a tour of the valley.
Your earnings depend on the number of mutants and enemies killed by the tourists.
Killed a mutant.
The creature hopped away.
Shot a mutant.
One less creature.
I killed that creature.
Killed the bastard.
The bastard hopped away.
Shot him, shot him dead.
Got a bullet.
I killed the scum.
From me
into the piggy bank
Tourists: Hey, where are you? Don't go too far!
Alright, let's see.
dead.
earnings
said he won't go on a trip with you again.
mutants killed:
enemies killed:
Number of anomalies visited:
Satisfied.
Content.
Had a crappy time.
Disappointed.
Total:
Tourists: Wait a minute, let's take a look at the anomaly.
Wow, what a place!
What a location!
Amazing! I've never seen anything like it.
It's beautiful.
Tourists: Let's move on.
You can write off my career as a guide.
Maximilian: Stalker, I see you're nearby - come over and let's chat.
Find Palyich %s
You need to bring Palyich %s so that he can provide more serious upgrades to your weapons or armor.

I need your help, stalker. Many stalkers come to me asking me to fix their weapons, but I can't. I don't have the right tools for it. I would gladly upgrade practically any gear if I had the necessary set. Can you help me with this?
Great, bro! I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have everything I need. If you can bring it, I won't forget your reward.
Thank you, this is exactly what I needed. Here, I promised you a reward, take it:
Find Palyich %s
You need to bring Palyich %s so that he can provide more serious upgrades to your weapons or armor.

Things have noticeably improved, more and more stalkers come to me for upgrades, but I could do more if I had more tools. The set you brought is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. If you brought a more complete set, I would be grateful to you.
I need %s. If you bring it, you'll get a reward.
Great! Here's your reward, you earned it!
Find Palyich %s
You need to bring Palyich %s so that he can provide more serious upgrades to your weapons or armor.
The set you brought is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. If you brought calibration tools, I would be grateful to you.
I need %s. If you bring it, you'll get a reward.
Yes! Yes! Here's your reward, you earned it!
